Name: Absorption: Sound of Wind
Desc:
Dragon Vein Skill, Absorption Skill
When Spirit Sprinkling hits, the Aero Spirit quietly shows up to create a sound of wind that continuously attacks enemies.

H.Old:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec, the Sound of Wind is created at one of the locations where the enemy was hit. Sound of Wind attacks up to 6 enemies with 250% damage for 3 times.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
H.New:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec., the Sound of Wind is created at one of the locations where the enemy was hit, and continuously attacks up to 6 enemies at 250% Damage 3 times.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
